channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- Calendar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- Calendar

item.title: CVE-2018-8927|2024-09-16T17:34:04.395Z -- synology -- calendar
item.description: Improper authorization vulnerability in SYNO.Cal.Event in Calendar before 2.1.2-0511 allows remote authenticated users to create arbitrary events via the (1) cal_id or (2) original_cal_id parameter.

item.title: CVE-2019-11825|2024-09-16T20:03:10.238Z -- synology -- calendar
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Event Editor in Synology Calendar before 2.3.0-0615 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the title parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-13299|2024-09-16T19:24:24.014Z -- synology -- calendar
item.description: Relative path traversal vulnerability in Attachment Uploader in Synology Calendar before 2.2.2-0532 allows remote authenticated users to upload arbitrary files via the filename parameter.

item.title: CVE-2019-11820|2024-09-16T20:12:35.910Z -- synology -- calendar
item.description: Information exposure through process environment vulnerability in Synology Calendar before 2.3.3-0620 allows local users to obtain credentials via cmdline.

item.title: CVE-2019-11829|2024-09-16T18:04:00.490Z -- synology -- calendar
item.description: OS command injection vulnerability in drivers_syno_import_user.php in Synology Calendar before 2.3.1-0617 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via the crafted 'X-Real-IP' header.
